name: Business Dynamics
description:
Business Dynamics is a physics-based action platformer where your goal is to break as much office equipment as you can. I made it for Unreal Engine Summer Jam, whose theme was “Make It Count”: you play as an accountant with a magical briefcase, and have a limited amount of time to achieve your goal of massively defrauding an insurance company.

For the Mac version (which this would normally be on the same page as, but I can’t make changes to this one while the judging’s going on), go here.
